verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. I said, “I will watch \w my|strong="H1732"\w* ways so \w that|strong="H1732"\w* I will \w not|strong="H1732"\w* sin \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* tongue; I will guard \w my|strong="H1732"\w* mouth \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* muzzle as long as \w the|strong="H1732"\w* wicked are present.”

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* speechless \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w still|strong="H5704"\w*; \w I|strong="H5704"\w* remained \w silent|strong="H6310"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* speaking good, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* sorrow \w was|strong="H6310"\w* stirred.
My heart \w grew|strong="H5916"\w* hot within me; as I mused, \w the|strong="H2896"\w* fire burned. Then I spoke \w with|strong="H2896"\w* my tongue:

“Show \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H1696"\w* end \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* days. Let \w me|strong="H1696"\w* know how fleeting \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w life|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3117"\w*, \w indeed|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* handbreadths, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w nothing|strong="H4100"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w*. Truly \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* best exists \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w but|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath. Selah

\w Surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* goes \w about|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* phantom; \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* bustles \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*; \w he|strong="H3117"\w* heaps \w up|strong="H5414"\w* riches \w not|strong="H5414"\w* knowing \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* haul \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w now|strong="H1980"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w do|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* wait? \w My|strong="H3045"\w* hope \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w*.

Deliver \w me|strong="H4100"\w* from all \w my|strong="H6258"\w* transgressions; \w do|strong="H4100"\w* not make \w me|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* reproach \w of|strong="H8431"\w* fools.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* become mute; \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H7760"\w* open \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* what \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w Remove|strong="H6605"\w* \w Your|strong="H6213"\w* scourge \w from|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am perishing \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* force \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w Your|strong="H6213"\w* hand.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* discipline \w and|strong="H3027"\w* correct \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity, consuming \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moth \w what|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* holds dear; surely each man \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vapor. Selah

Hear \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1892"\w* give ear \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cry \w for|strong="H5921"\w* help; \w do|strong="H3605"\w* not \w be|strong="H3605"\w* deaf \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* weeping. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreigner dwelling \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w like|strong="H6211"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fathers.

Turn \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* gaze \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* again \w be|strong="H3068"\w* cheered \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* depart \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w*.”
